item.title: I need help with command
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 0; p.sM(""+ playerName + " has demoted you!"); sM("You have made demote "+playerName+""); p.disconnected = true; p.logoutButton = true; } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to demote.."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with command

this command is for owners and higher.

P.S don’t use the Insert Code to add a code just add [ code ] and [ / code ] for the end. Remember to ignore the spaces[/quote]

thats the same thing you just changed it to owners and higher.

item.title: I need help with command
item.dc:creator: @Undeadscape Undeadscape
item.description:
@Undeadscape wrote:

I cant understand wwhat is wrong with this command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("party") && playerRights > 3) { addItem(995,200000000); addItem(1051,200000000); addItem(1058,200000000); addItem(1056,200000000); addItem(1054,200000000); addItem(1039,200000000); addItem(1041,200000000); addItem(1043,200000000); addItem(1045,200000000); addItem(1047,200000000); addItem(1049,200000000); addItem(963,200000000); }

Also, i need help with demote

if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client)server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.playerRights = 1; p.sM(""+ playerName + " has demoted you!"); sM("You have made demote "+playerName+""); p.disconnected = true; p.logoutButton = true; } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to promote.."); } }

Read full topic
